column4: Hello all -- I have  quick question.  I am installing a server, but one of the packages I use has a better version in the Debian repository.  But the package name is the same in both Debian and Ubuntu.  Is there a way to tell apt-get to always get this package from a particular repository?
that can break things very badly.
if you need the latest - there might be Ubuntu PPA repos for what3ever it is you want.
